description: 北外大学生艺术团合唱团成立于 2002 年，由众多热爱音乐、喜爱唱歌的北外人组成，是北外人数最多、影响力最大的社团集体之一，现由100余位来自各个专业的在校生组成，均非音乐专业生或特长生。曾获18年北京市大学生艺术节声乐金奖；参与庆祝中国共

songs.song_name: ビンクスの酒（宾克斯的美酒）
songs.lyrics:
演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢伴：谢梓玥
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ビンクスの酒を届けに行くよ
海風気まかせ波まかせ
潮の向こうで夕日も騒ぐ
空にゃ輪をかく鳥の唄
ビンクスの酒を届けに行くよ
海風気まかせ波まかせ
潮の向こうで夕日も騒ぐ
空にゃ輪をかく鳥の唄
ビンクスの酒を届けに行くよ
我ら海賊海割ってく
波を枕にねぐらは船よ
帆に旗に蹴立てるはドクロ
ビンクスの酒を届けに行くよ
我ら海賊海割ってく
波を枕にねぐらは船よ
帆に旗に蹴立てるはドクロ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ビンクスの酒を届けに行くよ
今日か明日かと宵の夢
手を振る影にもう会えないよ
何をくよくよ明日も月夜
ビンクスの酒を届けに行くよ
ドンと一丁唄おう船場の歌
どうせ誰でもいつかはホネよ
果てなしあてなし笑い話
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
ヨホホホヨホホホ
行くぞ！

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥：王瀛彩
钢琴：张帆
是这般柔情的你
给我一个梦想
徜徉在祈福的波浪中盈盈地荡漾
在你的臂弯
是这般深情的你
摇晃我的梦想
缠绵像海里每一个无名的浪花
在你的身上
睡梦成真
转身浪影汹涌没红尘
残留水纹 空留遗恨
愿只愿他生
昨日的身影能相随
永生永世不离分
是这般奇情的你
粉碎我的梦想
仿佛像水面泡沫的短暂光亮
是我的一生
睡梦成真
转身浪影汹涌没红尘
残留水纹 空留遗恨
愿只愿他生
昨日的身影能相随
永生永世不离分
是这般奇情的你
粉碎我的梦想
仿佛像水面泡沫的短暂光亮
是我的一生

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
钢伴：张安琪
Oh! Hush thee, my baby
The night is behind us
And black are the waters
That sparkled so green
The moon o’er the combers
Looks downward to find us
At rest in the hollows
That rustle between
Where billow meets billow
There soft be thy pillow
Ah weary wee flipperling
Curl at thy ease!
The storm shall not wake thee
Nor shark over take thee
Asleep in the arms
Of the slow swinging seas
Asleep in the arms
Of the slow swinging seas

songs.song_name: 星のため息（星星的叹息）

songs.lyrics:
演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
Oh, Danny boy
The pipes, the pipes are calling
From glen to glen
And down the mountain side
The summer’s gone
And all roses falling
It’s you, it’s you
Must go and I must bide
But come ye back
When summer’s in the meadow
Or when the valley’s
Hush’d and white with snow
It’s I’ll be here
In sunshine or in shadow
Oh, Danny boy, oh Danny boy
I love you so
But when ye come
And all the flow’rs are dying
If I am dead
As dead I well may be
Ye’ll come and find
The place where I am lying
And knell and say
An “A-ve” there for me
And I shall hear
Though soft you tread above me
And all my grave
Will warmer, sweeter be
For you will bend
And tell me that you love me
And I shall sleep in peace
Until you come to me

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢伴：张安琪
What shall we do with a drunken sailor
What shall we do with a drunken sailor
What shall we do with a drunken sailor
Earlye in the morning
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Earlye in the morning
Put him in the scuppers with a hosepipe on him
Put him in the scuppers with a hosepipe on him
Put him in the scuppers with a hosepipe on him
Earlye! (clap)
Earlye in the morning
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Earlye in the morning
Put him in the long boat till he's sober
Put him in the long boat till he's sober
Put him in the long boat till he's sober
Earlye in the morning
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Earlye in the morning
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Wey hey and up she rises
Earlye in the (stamp) Morning!

songs.song_name: Can You Feel The Love Tonight

songs.lyrics:
演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
沙锤：汤力欧 铃鼓：马蓁欣 非洲鼓：曹敏祺
Siyahamb’ ekukhanyeni kwenkos’
We are marching in the light of god
Siyahamb’ ekukhanyeni kwenkos’
Siyahamb’ ekukhanyeni kwenkos’

演唱：
女高：李  飒   周肇敏
女低：郭闻博
男高：聂  畅   黄金德
男低：杨萧瑞
Mentor：孙雨欣
We're outward bound from Liverpool
Hooray, Santy Anna
The sails are set and the hatches full
All on the plains of Mexico
In Mexico I long to be
Hooray, Santy Anna
With a tight wasted girl all on my knee
All on the plains of Mexico
We're outward bound for Mexico
Hooray, Santy Anna
To Mexico where the whalefish blow
All on the plains of Mexico
Them Spanish girl I do adore
Hooray, Santy Anna
They all drink wine an' ax for more
All on the plains of Mexico
We're outward bound from Liverpool
Hooray, Santy Anna
The sails are set and the hatches full
All on the plains of Mexico
In Mexico I long to be
Hooray, Santy Anna
With a tight wasted girl all on my knee
All on the plains of Mexico

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
钢琴：宋睿智
I will be the gladdest thing
Under the sun!
Under the sun…
I will touch a hundred flowers
I will touch a hundred flowers
And not pick one
I will look at cliffs and clouds
I will look at cliffs and clouds
I will look at cliffs and clouds
I will look at cliffs and clouds
I will look at cliffs and clouds
With quiet eyes
With quiet eyes
With quiet eyes
I watch the wind bow down the grass
I watch the wind bow down the grass
I watch the wind bow down the grass
I watch the wind bow down the grass
And the grass rise
And when lights begin to show
And when lights begin to show
Up from the town
I will mark which must be mine
I will mark which must be mine
And then start down!
I will touch a hundred flowers
I will touch a hundred flowers
And not pick one

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
钢琴：曹敏祺
非洲鼓：谢佩珊 吉他：易曾荣
有一个地方很远很远
那里又风有古老的草原
骄傲的母亲目光深远
温柔的塔娜话语缠绵
Ulaanbaatariin udesh
Namuuhan namuuhan
歌儿轻轻唱 风儿轻轻吹
Ulaanbaatariin udesh
Namuuhan namuuhan
唱歌的人儿不许掉眼泪
有一个地方很远很远
那里有一生最重的思念
草原的子民无忧无虑
大地的儿女把酒当歌
Ulaanbaatariin udesh
Namuuhan namuuhan
你远在天边 近在我眼前
Ulaanbaatariin udesh
Namuuhan namuuhan
听歌的人儿不许掉眼泪
Ulaanbaatariin udesh
Namuuhan namuuhan
你远在天边 近在我眼前
Ulaanbaatariin udesh
Namuuhan namuuhan
听歌的人儿不许掉眼泪
听歌的人儿不许掉眼泪
听歌的人儿不许掉眼泪

演唱：
男高：郭伯桢	陈桢凌
男中：李熠凡	易曾荣
男低：冯文昊	江昆桐
Mentor：冯文昊
There once was a ship that put to sea
The name of the ship was the Billy of Tea
The winds blew up, her bow dipped down
Oh blow, my bully boys, blow!
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
She had not been two weeks from shore
When down on her a right whale bore
The captain called all hands and swore
He'd take that whale in tow
Huh!
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
Before the boat had hit the water
The whale's tail came up and caught her
All hands to the side harpooned and fought her
When she dived down below
Huh!
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
No line was cut no whale was freed
The captain's mind was not on greed
But he belonged to the whaleman's creed
She took that ship in tow
Huh!
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
For forty days or even more
The line went slack then tight once more
All boats were lost
There were only four
But still that whale did go
Huh!
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
As far as I've heard the fight's still on
The line's not cut and the whale's not gone
The Wellerman makes his regular call
To encourage the captain crew and all
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day when the tonguin' is done
We'll take our leave and go
Take our leave and go
Huh!

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
钢伴：张晓桐
飞
飞 轻轻飞
风吹我过这座山
风吹我过这片水
飞 慢慢飞
这座山这片水
不知何时归
飞  轻轻飞
看不清点点灯火
只听见潺潺溪水
飞 慢慢飞
静夜里人安睡
有谁伴我飞
忽然风停
我飘落你身旁
多想长留此处
结束漫漫旅途
无奈风再起
带我离开大地
飞向未知方向
飞 自在飞
白云在脚下来回
清风是我的翅膀
飞 随风飞
渐行渐远飞扬
那座山那片水
只有在梦里回
渐行渐远…
只有梦里回

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢伴：黄雅沛
To dream the impossible dream
To fight the unbeatable foe
To bear with unbearable sorrow
To run where the brave dare not go
To right the unrightable wrong
To love, pure and chaste, from afar
To try when your arms are too weary
To reach the unreachable star
This is my quest
To follow that star
No matter how hopeless
No matter how far
To fight for the right
Without question or pause
To be willing to march into hell for a heavenly cause!
And I know
If I'll only be true
To this glorious quest
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest
And the world will be better for this
That one man scorned and covered with scars
Still strove, with his last ounce of courage
To reach the unreachable star
This is my quest
To follow that star
No matter how hopeless
No matter how far
To fight for the right
Without question or pause
To be willing to march into hell for a heavenly cause
And I know
If I'll only be true
To this glorious quest
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest
And the world will be better for this
That one man scorned and covered with scars
Still strove with his last ounce of courage
To reach the unreachable star
The unreachable star
The unreachable star！

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
钢琴：马蓁欣
我有一个恋爱
我爱天上的明星
我爱他们的晶莹
人间没有这异样的神明
我有一个恋爱
我爱天上的明星
我爱他们的晶莹
人间没有这异样的神明
在冷峭的暮冬的黄昏
在寂寞的灰色的清晨
在海上 在风雨后的山顶
永远有一颗
万颗的明星
山涧边小草花的知心
高楼上小孩童的欢欣
旅行人的灯亮与南针
万万里外闪烁的精灵
我有一颗 破碎的魂灵
像一堆破碎的水晶
散布在荒野的枯草里
饱啜你一瞬瞬的殷勤
人生的冰激与柔情
我也曾尝味 我也曾容忍
有时阶砌下蟋蟀的秋吟
引起我心伤 逼迫我泪零
我袒露我的坦白的胸襟
我献爱与一天的明星
任凭人生 是幻是真
地球存在或是消泯
太空中永远
有不昧的明星！

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
I am sailing
I am sailing
Home again
'Cross the sea
I'm sailing
Stormy waters
To be near you
To be free
We are sailing
We are sailing
Home again
'Cross the sea
We are sailing
Stormy waters
To be near you
To be free
I am flying
I am flying
Like a bird
'Cross the sea
I am flying
Passing high clouds
To be near you
To be free
We are sailing
We are sailing
Home again
'Cross the sea
We are sailing
Stormy waters
To be near you
To be free
I am sailing
I am sailing
Home again
'Cross the sea
I'm sailing
Stormy waters
To be near you
To be free

演唱：
女高：张競元	翟梓西 冀佳	张锦心
女低：李岚冰	白玛德姬
男高：张清硕	吴骐丞
男低：杨世阁	欧阳珏 李银海	冯文昊
Sweet is the sound of my new-born wings
I stretch them open and let them dry
I haven’t seen this world before
But I’m excused, I’m a butterfly
Sweet is the touch of your new-born wings
We fly in circles, we play with the sun
We haven’t seen this world before
So clear, so bright,
So blue the sky
Love me, love me on the leaves
Before we say goodbye
Love me, kiss me with the breeze
You will be my lullaby
Tomorrow I’ll die
You’ll be my lullaby
Love me, kiss me with the breeze
Kiss me with breeze
Love me, love me on the leaves
Love me, love me!
Love me, love me on the leaves
Before we say goodbye
Love me, kiss me with the breeze
You’ll be my lullaby
Sweet is the wind as it gently blows
The day away and the night-time comes
Great are the wonders that silence shows
I fall asleep and I dream of the sun
And my butterfly

songs.song_name: 6番目の駅（《千与千寻》电影插曲）

songs.lyrics:
作词： Jack Lawrence 作曲： Charles Trenet, Albert Lasry
合唱改编：Stephen Calgaro
演唱：
女高：王瀛彩	谢佩姗
女低：马蓁欣	张思然 陈婧倩 吴雨萌
男高：乔智涵	卜雨
男低：杨世阁	王思源 李银海	潘青羿
I’d go sailing
Let’s go sailing
I’ll go, oh, I’ll go sailing
Beyond the sea
Somewhere beyond the sea
Somewhere waiting for me
My lover stands on golden sands
And watches the ships
That go sailing
Let’s go sailing
Somewhere beyond the sea
She’s there watching for me
If I could fly like birds on high
Then straight to her arms
I’d go sailing
Come and sail with me
It’s far beyond the stars
It’s near beyond the moon
What do you know beyond a doubt?
My heart will lead me there soon
We’ll meet beyond the shore
We’ll kiss just as before
Happy we’ll be beyond the sea
Oh, and never again
I’d go sailing…
What do you know beyond a doubt?
My heart will lead me there soon
We’ll meet beyond the shore
We’ll kiss just as before
Happy we’ll be beyond the sea
And never again
I’ll go sailing
So long, sailing
No more sailing

songs.song_name: 其の人が歌うとき（When The People Sing）
songs.lyrics:
演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢伴：曹敏祺
歌词大意标注：周芯宇/冀佳/黄思然
其の人が歌う時
其の声は遠くから来る
其の人が歌う時
其の声は遠くから来る
うずくまる一人の年寄りの思い出から
朽ち果てたたくさんの太古の木魂から
争い合う心と心の隙間から
其の声は来る
其の声は来る
其の人が歌う時
其の声は
其の声はもっと遠くから来る
（大昔の深みから）
海のうねりの深みから
明日の雪の静けさから
其の人が歌うとき
忘れられた祈りの思い呟きから
その声は来る
其の喉は枯れることのない深い井戸
其の腕は見えない罪人を抱き留める
其の足は大地を打つ
其の目は光の速さを捉え
其の耳はまだ生まれない
赤ん坊の微かな足音へすまされる
其の人が歌う時
夜の中の見知らぬ子供の一粒の涙は
私の涙
どんな言葉ももどかしい所に
一つの確かな
一つの確かな答え聞こえる
国々の境を越え砂漠を越え
頑なな心動かない体を越え
未来へと遡り其の声は届く
最も不幸せな人のもとまで
其の声は其の声は
遠くまで届く
其の声は其の声は
遠くまで届く
其の人が歌う時
其の人が歌う時

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢琴：张安琪
Take me to the water
Take me to the sea
Take me to the river
So that my spirit can be free
Gonna lay my burdens down
Down by the riverside
Gonna wade in the water
The water that flows both deep and wide
Oh take me take me take me to the water
Gonna lay down my burden
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Gonna lay down my burden
Down by the riverside
Oh take me take me take me to the water
Take me to the water
Take me to the sea
Take me to the river
So that my spirit can be free
Gonna lay my burdens down
Down by the riverside
Gonna wade in the water
The water that flows both deep and wide
Oh take me take me take me to the water
Gonna lay down my sword and shield
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Gonna lay my sword and shield
Down by the riverside
Oh take me take me take me to the water
Wade in the
Wade in the
Wade in the water children
Wade in the
Wade in the
Wade in the water children
Wade in the
Wade in the
Wade in the water children
God's gonna trouble the water
Take me to the water
Take me to the sea
Take me to the water
Set my spirit free
Take me to the water
Take me to the sea
Take me to the water
Set my spirit free
Take me to the water (Wade)
Take me to the sea (Wade in the)
Take me to the water (Water children and)
Set my spirit free
Take me to the water (Wade)
Take me to the sea (Wade in the)
Take me to the water (Water children and)
Set my spirit free
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
I'll set my spirit free
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
Down by the riverside
I'll set my spirit free
Oh take me take me take me to the water
Oh take me take me take me to the water
Oh take me take me take me to the water

演唱：
女高：陈 瑟 马佳乐 冀 佳
女低：张思然 郭闻博 黄思然
男高：卜 雨 田伟杰 易曾荣
男低：田焘玮 冯文昊 江昆桐
Solo：李熠凡
Mentor：马佳乐
La la la
Yay
La la la
Ya ya ya ya ya ya
La la la
Yay
La la la
Ya ya ya ya ya ya
La la la
Yay
La la la
Ya ya ya ya ya ya
La la la
Yay
La la la
Ya ya ya ya ya ya
Co-co-nut
Co-co-co-co-co-nut
Bu-co-nut
Co-co-nut
Co-co-co-co-co-nut

Da coconut nut is a giant nut
If you eat too much you get very fat
Now da coconut nut is a big big nut
But this delicious nut it not a nut
It's da coco fruit
Of the coco tree
From the coco palm family
There are so many uses of the coconut tree
You can build a bigger house for the family
All you need is to find a coconut man
If he cuts the tree
He gets the fruit free
It's da coco fruit
Of the coco tree
From the coco palm family
Co-co-nut
Co-co-co-co-co-nut
Bu-co-nut
Co-co-nut
Co-co-co-co-co-nut
Bu-co-nut
Da coconut bark for the kitchen floor
If you save some of it you can build a door
Now da coconut trunk Do not throw this junk
If you save some of it you'll have a second floor
Da coconut wood is very good
It can stand twenty years if you pray it would
Now da coconut root to tell you the truth
You can throw it or use it as firewood
Da coconut leaves good shade it gives
For the roof for walls up against the eaves
Now da coconut fruit say my relatives
Make good cannonballs up against da thieves
It's the coco fruit
Of the coco tree
From the coco palm family
Da coconut nut is giant nut
If you eat too much you get very fat
Now da coconut nut is a big big nut
But this delicious nut is not a nut

songs.song_name: As Long as I Have Music
songs.lyrics:
演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢伴：董文潇
When the world seems far beyond me
And I have no place to go
When my life seems cold and empty
And I feel I'm all alone
Then a song that I remember
Helps to ease my troubled mind
And I find the strength within me
To reach out just one more time
For as long as I have music
As long as there's a song for me to sing
I can find my way, I can see a brighter day
The music in my life will set my spirit free!
When the road is dark and lonely
And I feel I want to cry
When the dreams I keep inside me
Seem to fade and almost die
Then I call up on my music
And it helps to dry my tears
And I know that I can make it
I'll go on despite my fears
For as long as I have music
As long as there's a song for me to sing
I can find my way, I can see a brighter day
The music in my life will set my spirit free!
Set it free!

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
领唱：
女高：达丽芽 吴晨阳
女低：张笑 乐怡然
男高：姚博文 李芃成
男低：李熠凡 谈政熹
Maxwelton’s braes are bonnie
Where early falls the dew
And it’s there that Annie Laurie
Gave me her promise true
Gave me her promise true
Which never forgot will be
And for bonnie Annie Laurie
I’d lay me down and die
Her brow is like the snow drift
Her throat is like the swan
Her face it is the fairest
That ever the sun shone on
That ever the sun shone on
And dark blue is her eye
And for bonnie Annie Laurie
I would lay me down and die

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢琴：曹敏祺
And when on wings of song we fly
High above the mountain
Softly on gentle breeze
A whisper in the wind
We are the music, we bring the music
With every breath, with every word, with every sigh
We are the music, we sing the music
Our voices raised a beacon in the night
And now a timeless voice echoes through the wind song
Softly on gentle breeze
A whisper in the wind
Explain a sunrise, describe a star
Recall a memory from a place so very far
Say it with music, sing it with music
To every mountain high and shining star
We are the music, we bring the music
With every breath, with every word, with every sigh
We are the music, we sing the music
And on the wings of song we fly to places far beyond the sky
A gift of music to you

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
学生指挥 ：王瀛彩
O Shenandoah, I long to see you
And hear your rolling river
O Shenandoah, I long to see you
Way, we’re bound away
Across the wide Missouri
I long to see your smiling valley
And hear your rolling river
I long to see your smiling valley
Way, we’re bound away
Across the wide Missouri
‘Tis sev’n long years since last I see you
And hear your rolling river
‘Tis sev’n long years since last I see you
Way, we’re bound away
Across the wide Missouri
O Shenandoah, I long to see you
And hear your rolling river
O Shenandoah, I long to see you
Way, we’re bound away
Across the wide Missouri
O Shenandoah
O Shenandoah
O Shenandoah

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团
指导老师：熊天瑜
指挥：熊天瑜
钢琴：曹敏祺
Remember me
Though I have to say goodbye
Remember me
Don't let it make you cry
For even if I'm far away
I hold you in my heart
I sing a secret song to you
Each night we are apart
Remember me
Though I have to travel far
Remember me
Each time you hear a sad guitar
Know that I'm with you
The only way that I can be
Until you're in my arms again
Remember me
Remember me
Though I have to say goodbye
Remember me
Don't let it make you cry
For even if I'm far away
I hold you in my heart
I sing a secret song to you
Each night we are apart
Remember me
Though I have to travel far
Remember me
Each time you hear a sad guitar
Know that I'm with you
The only way that I can be
Until you're in my arms again
Remember me

那里绿草如茵

洒满了湖面

如云般游走
那变换的脚步
让我们难牵手
这一生一世
有多少你我

我们留恋忘返

演出：北京外国语大学合唱团

指挥：熊天瑜

I'll be your bridge
O'er troubled water
When you're down
I will carry you like a bridge
O'er troubled water
I will lay me down
When you're weary
Feeling small
When tears are in your eyes
I will dry them all
I'm on your side
When times get rough
And friends just can't be found
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
When you're down and out
When you're on the street my Lord
When evening falls so hard
I will comfort you
I'll take your part
Oh when darkness comes
And pain is all around
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will lay me down
I'll be your bridge
O'er troubled water
When you're down
I will carry you like a bridge
O'er troubled water
I will lay me down
Sail on silver girl
Sail on by
Your time has come to shine
All your dreams are on their way
See how they shine
Oh if you ever need a friend
Look around, I'm sailing right behind
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will ease your mind
Like a bridge over troubled water
I will ease your mind
I'll be your bridge
O'er troubled water
When you're down
I will carry you like a bridge
O'er troubled water
I will lay!
I will lay me down
Lay me down!

雨水滋润阳光辉洒

枝叶渐渐聚成伞一把

有时难免孤独害怕
